post.body: is what that previous message should've said....
wouldn't that be hilarious?! BTW I do NOT feel like making this drive today...
YES! I also got a really cute purse at Kohl's... and a jacket & a ring... good stuff.
Heading home from California. Can't miss the game tonight! Go Coyotes!
What did I say during the Oil slick game? LOL I don't remember now... I'll check out the blog tonight.
Just finished shopping the after Christmas sales omg my feet hurt! I'm ready to watch some hockey. Even more ready to sleep in my own bed...
I have offically blown my diet....
All I want for Christmas is for someone to solve the Coyotes financial problems & keep them in the desert for a long, long time!
will mostly be MIA until Saturday.
wishing I could spend the holidays on a tropical island. Must.. complete.. Christmas.. shopping.. Michalek post will have to wait. Sorry Z.
Going to bed, Yotes practice in the morning...
Just got back from watching the Coyotes sweep the Blue Jackets. GO COYOTES!!!
Working on next week's Z Michalek player spotlight. Check out last week's spotlight on Todd Fedoruk here: http://tinyurl.com/9m3tlc
is quite proud of the young Kyle Turris!
is thinking that having to be at work at 4 am is ri-goddam-diculous.
Trying to figure out the point of this...
